docs.snippet: The sports website said a long article about Daniel Holtzclaw, a former police officer convicted in a series of rapes, was “a complete failure.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: The sports website said a long article about Daniel Holtzclaw, a former police officer convicted in a series of rapes, was “a complete failure.”
docs.abstract: Sports website SB Nation, owned by Vox Media, removes lengthy article about former Oklahoma City Police Officer Daniel Holtzclaw, convicted on 18 charges of sexual assault against 13 black women;  move follows outpouring of public outrage over what readers felt was tone of sympathy toward Holtzclaw.

headline.main: SB Nation Removes Article Criticized as Sympathetic to Convicted Rapist
headline.print_headline: Site Removes Article Seen as Sympathetic to Rapist

docs.lead_paragraph: In past years, a team like the Toronto Raptors almost certainly would have been looking to add some help for the stretch run. They're holding down second place in the Eastern Conference, have been one of the league's hottest teams for the last month and seem poised to make a significant playoff push.
